'''Radiant Spincrystal 91''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Desert Lullaby]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a high-up platform inside the ruin that is located at [[Qusayr Al-Inkhida']].
